text: Peue na tasangka tamong churuga Yoh goh Neucuba gata le Allah Ngon ureueng dilee dum nibak gata Meuteumeung bala meularat leupah Teuka lom geumpa nyang raya that-that Rasul Hadharat sampoe that susah Geukheun le Rasul ngon ureueng mukmin Pajan Neutulong tanyoe le Allah Beu na tateupue Tuhan Neutulong Karap troh langsong tulongan Allah
